title: ceppina mATalu
sahitya:
ceppina mATalu vina rAdA nA cEpaTTi brOva dayalEdA


anupallavi

  eppaTikaina nIvE gatiyani karagina manasuna tirigittirigi nI


caraNam    atirUpa lAvaNya ninnu jUDa Asakoni ika vaccitirA patita pAvanuDu nIvani jEya
 prakkala konumani vEDitirA madura madhura kIrtanamula sadA nI guNa gAnamu jEsitirA
 sItApati ika brOtunani muddu muddugA palukula vina vEDi gAciyunna nE
